overview: The place where the classmates had to celebrate their Graduation is cancelled…  Marius rescues his classmates by taking them to a country side house which his mother, a real estate agent, has had many unsuccessful attempts in selling. For Marius it’s a way to gain recognition and attention from his classmates – he’s always been an outcast and a loner.
tagline: Beware of what you do to others.
title: Pensive
